text: The Horned Halo was an artifact from Dominaria that could be used to turn a Serra Angel into a fallen angel . One such artifact was used on the Serra Angel Trine by the Archmage Xarl Angel-Keeper . It was later removed from Trine by Rahel , and its fate it unknown. Grandmother Sengir knows the ritual that transforms Serra Angels into Fallen Angels. In her card art, she can be seen using a white feather as a quill, and with a basket full  of Horned Halos.
